thread.title: Rothschild & Co Adds Sumner Farren and Sara Coyle as Managing Directors in Chicago

author: cnbc.com
title: Rothschild & Co Adds Sumner Farren and Sara Coyle as Managing Directors in Chicago

organizations.name: head of rothschild & co north america

text:
Strengthens Industrials capabilities in Midwest with hiring of veteran bankers
Continues to expand Rothschild Global Advisory presence in North America
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Rothschild Global Advisory is further strengthening its North American business by announcing that it has hired Sumner Farren and Sara Coyle as Managing Directors in its Chicago office. Mr. Farren and Mrs. Coyle will join the Industrials group starting in late June.
“The addition of Sumner and Sara to our Chicago office provides additional experience and depth to the strong team there, which has already been successful since the office opened in 2016,” stated Jimmy Neissa, Head of Rothschild & Co North America. “We are delighted with the work Eric Hirschfield and his team have done to build our presence and reputation in the Midwest region, and adding two Managing Directors of this caliber reflects Rothschild & Co’s ongoing commitment to the U.S. market.”
With over 25 years of experience, Sumner Farren joins Rothschild Global Advisory from UBS, where he was a Managing Director responsible for the firm’s sellside M&A activities in North America. Prior to UBS, Mr. Farren spent 20 years at Bank of America Merrill Lynch in Chicago working primarily on M&A for a wide variety of industries. He received an MBA with a concentration in Analytic Finance from The Booth School of Management at the University of Chicago and a BS in Accounting from Auburn University.
Prior to joining Rothschild Global Advisory, Sara Coyle was also at UBS, where she was a Managing Director of the Global Industrials Group responsible for Industrial Distribution and Packaging coverage efforts. She joined the firm in 2015. Prior to UBS, Mrs. Coyle spent ten years at Bank of America Merrill Lynch and Citi, working on M&A, equity and debt financing transactions for a broad variety of Paper & Packaging, Distribution, Chemical, Building Products and Aerospace & Defense companies. She received an MBA with a concentration in Finance from Yale School of Management in and a BS in Mechanical Engineering (summa cum laude) from Cornell University.
Mrs. Coyle and Mr. Farren have worked together on many transactions while at UBS and Bank of America Merrill Lynch, including the recent sales of CharterNex to Leonard Green, Consolidated Container to Loews Corporation, Fort Dearborn to Advent and American Tire Distributors to Ares. At Rothschild Global Advisory, they will help build the firm’s growing presence globally in General Industrials, Distribution, Paper and Packaging, and reinforce the mandate of Rothschild Global Advisory to be a premier strategic advisor to companies in the Midwest United States.
Eric Hirschfield, Managing Director and Head of the Midwest Region for Rothschild Global Advisory, added, “Given how active our Chicago office has been since we launched and the opportunities we see in the current environment, it was a natural progression to expand our range of capabilities in the Midwest region. Sumner and Sara will be vital in taking our presence to the next level.”
The news follows other significant hires in North America over the past year, including Chris Gaertner and Walid Khiari as Managing Directors in Silicon Valley; Reza Vahabzadeh, Aashis Mehta and Timothy Hotchandani as Managing Directors in New York; and Siddharth Hariharan as a Managing Director in Los Angeles.
About Rothschild & Co
With a team of c.3 500 talented financial services specialists on the ground in over 40 countries across the world, our integrated global network of trusted professionals provide in-depth market intelligence and effective long-term solutions for our clients in Global Advisory, Private Wealth & Asset Management, and Merchant Banking. Rothschild & Co is family-controlled and independent and has been at the centre of the world’s financial markets for over 200 years.
Rothschild Global Advisory, a division of the Rothschild & Co Group, designs and executes strategic M&A and financing solutions. It combines the breadth of its advisory offering with a high volume of transactions to achieve a unique understanding and perspective into markets and participants worldwide.
Rothschild Global Advisory provides impartial, expert advice to large and mid-sized corporations, private equity, families and entrepreneurs, and governments through an unrivalled network of 900 industry and financing specialists in over 40 countries worldwide.
